title: HTML
post_text: HTML is one of the first concepts that I learned how to use a beginning coder. My very first site consisted of just HTML.

title: CSS
post_text: CSS is where coders really get to show their creativity and their styles. In my opinion without CSS websites would be boring and would NOT grab users attention.

title: Javascript
post_text: Javascripts is purpose is for adding interactive behavior to web pages. JavaScript allows users to interact with web pages and adds functionality to an otherwise static page.

title: React.JS
post_text: I have been studying React for a while now and I have to say that it is phenomenal! I love how everything is broken up into components, it allows for easier organization and code flow.

title: Hashing
post_text: A very important part of user authentication is hashing passwords. When a user creates a password and when they log in, sensitive information like the password should be protected. bcrypt is a popular npm package that accomplishes this task.
